data.title: Ardabīl Geographic coordinates
data.meta_description: Geographic location of Ardabīl. Coordinates in Decimal Degrees (DM), Degrees and Decimal Minutes (DDM) and Degrees, Minutes and Seconds (DMS).
data.text:
Ardabīl is located at latitude 38.2498 and longitude 48.2933. It is part of Asia and the northern hemisphere.

The geographic coordinate system enables any place in the world to be located using its latitude and longitude. The latitude is the position relative to the equator, specifying the north-south position. The longitude specifies the east-west position measured from a reference meridian (usually the Greenwich Prime Meridian). The latitude and longitude of Ardabīl have been calculated based on the geodetic datum WGS84.

Map of Ardabīl with coordinates

Latitude and longitude of Iran
